experience.title: COO's Office - Strategy
experience.description: Overview: Worked on global cost optimization and IPO exclusivity clauses, directly reporting to CEO Mr. Ritesh Agarwal, COO and CPO Mr. Abhinav Sinhan, and VP of Product Mr. Ravi Thakur.Achievements:Cost Reduction: Achieved a 41% reduction in Tech G&A costs by eliminating 12 office locations in Denmark and streamlining non-essential services.Employee Cost Savings: Reduced an additional USD XXK in monthly employee costs for the Europe entity by negotiating and closing an IT asset management contract.Coverage Improvement: Improved the coverage of OYO360 by 16% through a storefront audit across all business verticals, targeting over 200K patrons.
experience.description_html: Overview: Worked on global cost optimization and IPO exclusivity clauses, directly reporting to CEO Mr. Ritesh Agarwal, COO and CPO Mr. Abhinav Sinhan, and VP of Product Mr. Ravi Thakur.Achievements:Cost Reduction: Achieved a 41% reduction in Tech G&A costs by eliminating 12 office locations in Denmark and streamlining non-essential services.Employee Cost Savings: Reduced an additional USD XXK in monthly employee costs for the Europe entity by negotiating and closing an IT asset management contract.Coverage Improvement: Improved the coverage of OYO360 by 16% through a storefront audit across all business verticals, targeting over 200K patrons.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Overview: Co-founded Ciostik, a web-based B2C digital electronics rental platform, achieving DPIIT Recognition from the Ministry of Commerce, Government of India in 2021.Achievements:Revenue Generation: Led a customer acquisition strategy that generated INR 1M+ in revenue, successfully managing a team of 10 to secure over 500 clients.SEO and Traffic Growth: Implemented an effective SEO initiative that resulted in a 60% month-on-month increase in site traffic and propelled ciostik.com to rank #3 in regional search results.Marketing Campaigns: Spearheaded marketing campaigns, including webinars and a campus ambassador program, attracting 2500+ unique visitors.Competitions: Secured the 1st runner-up position among 50+ student startups at IIT KGP's Startup Bootcamp 2021, earning a cash prize of INR XXk.Reason for Closure:Had to shut down operations due to the necessity of returning to campus to complete my undergraduate studies after the COVID-19 lockdown ended.
experience.description_html: Overview: Co-founded Ciostik, a web-based B2C digital electronics rental platform, achieving DPIIT Recognition from the Ministry of Commerce, Government of India in 2021.Achievements:Revenue Generation: Led a customer acquisition strategy that generated INR 1M+ in revenue, successfully managing a team of 10 to secure over 500 clients.SEO and Traffic Growth: Implemented an effective SEO initiative that resulted in a 60% month-on-month increase in site traffic and propelled ciostik.com to rank #3 in regional search results.Marketing Campaigns: Spearheaded marketing campaigns, including webinars and a campus ambassador program, attracting 2500+ unique visitors.Competitions: Secured the 1st runner-up position among 50+ student startups at IIT KGP's Startup Bootcamp 2021, earning a cash prize of INR XXk.Reason for Closure:Had to shut down operations due to the necessity of returning to campus to complete my undergraduate studies after the COVID-19 lockdown ended.

experience.title: Management Consulting
experience.description: Overview: Developed a market entry strategy for an INR 12 Billion+ construction company in the water Operations and Maintenance (O&M) space in India.Achievements:Market Entry Strategy: Crafted a strategy to secure 30 nationwide O&M projects worth USD XXX Mn by conducting an in-depth competitor analysis.Strategic Model: Worked with over 10 C-suite executives to devise a model for an in-house skill development school to train up to 10,000 workers.Efficiency Improvements: Saved over 100 human hours weekly by creating a Power BI dashboard encompassing 6+ modules to streamline status tracking of projects.
experience.description_html: Overview: Developed a market entry strategy for an INR 12 Billion+ construction company in the water Operations and Maintenance (O&M) space in India.Achievements:Market Entry Strategy: Crafted a strategy to secure 30 nationwide O&M projects worth USD XXX Mn by conducting an in-depth competitor analysis.Strategic Model: Worked with over 10 C-suite executives to devise a model for an in-house skill development school to train up to 10,000 workers.Efficiency Improvements: Saved over 100 human hours weekly by creating a Power BI dashboard encompassing 6+ modules to streamline status tracking of projects.

experience.title: Research - Knowledge Sharing
experience.description: Overview: Conducted comprehensive research on the engineering of serendipity, focusing on when knowledge sharing leads to knowledge production among subject experts.Achievements:Literature Review and Empirical Analysis: Completed a thorough literature review and empirical analysis to derive conclusions for the research project.Qualitative Analysis: Conducted a qualitative analysis of feedback from 195 evaluators, resulting in a Tableau dashboard that highlighted key characteristics.Algorithm Development: Enhanced scraping efficiency by nearly 60% with a high-performance Python algorithm, extracting over 300,000 PubMed records.Data Analysis: Analyzed a dataset of over 500,000 papers and 20 qualitative indicators using MS-Excel and R to extract valuable insights.
experience.description_html: Overview: Conducted comprehensive research on the engineering of serendipity, focusing on when knowledge sharing leads to knowledge production among subject experts.Achievements:Literature Review and Empirical Analysis: Completed a thorough literature review and empirical analysis to derive conclusions for the research project.Qualitative Analysis: Conducted a qualitative analysis of feedback from 195 evaluators, resulting in a Tableau dashboard that highlighted key characteristics.Algorithm Development: Enhanced scraping efficiency by nearly 60% with a high-performance Python algorithm, extracting over 300,000 PubMed records.Data Analysis: Analyzed a dataset of over 500,000 papers and 20 qualitative indicators using MS-Excel and R to extract valuable insights.

experience.title: Research - Black Capitalism
experience.description: Overview: Researched on Black Capitalism (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) and corporate philanthropy post George Floyd's murder.Achievements:Monitoring Rate: Tracked USD 41 Bn out of USD 49.5 Bn, demonstrating an 82.8% monitoring rate in corporate pledges by analyzing over 80 annual reports.Fund Allocation Analysis: Exposed fund allocation dynamics: USD 43 Bn for profitable ventures, USD 4.2 Bn pledged as grants, and USD 70 Mn for criminal justice.DEI Dataset: Collaborated with Wharton School to compile a DEI-focused dataset covering 86 companies and optimized efficiency using Macros VBA.
experience.description_html: Overview: Researched on Black Capitalism (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) and corporate philanthropy post George Floyd's murder.Achievements:Monitoring Rate: Tracked USD 41 Bn out of USD 49.5 Bn, demonstrating an 82.8% monitoring rate in corporate pledges by analyzing over 80 annual reports.Fund Allocation Analysis: Exposed fund allocation dynamics: USD 43 Bn for profitable ventures, USD 4.2 Bn pledged as grants, and USD 70 Mn for criminal justice.DEI Dataset: Collaborated with Wharton School to compile a DEI-focused dataset covering 86 companies and optimized efficiency using Macros VBA.

experience.title: Public Advisory - State Health
experience.description: Overview: Worked on strategic interventions towards achieving universal health coverage by assessing health systems in four Indian states for the Asian Development Bank's $300 million loan.Achievements:Report Compilation: Compiled four comprehensive reports detailing the health systems assessment of four Indian states.Stakeholder Coordination: Coordinated with 10 stakeholders to design a matrix using MS Excel for comparative analysis of states based on 30+ health indicators.Assessment and Recommendations: Identified the current as-is scenario, key gaps, and barriers, and provided recommendations for the pinpointed healthcare challenges in four states.
experience.description_html: Overview: Worked on strategic interventions towards achieving universal health coverage by assessing health systems in four Indian states for the Asian Development Bank's $300 million loan.Achievements:Report Compilation: Compiled four comprehensive reports detailing the health systems assessment of four Indian states.Stakeholder Coordination: Coordinated with 10 stakeholders to design a matrix using MS Excel for comparative analysis of states based on 30+ health indicators.Assessment and Recommendations: Identified the current as-is scenario, key gaps, and barriers, and provided recommendations for the pinpointed healthcare challenges in four states.

experience.title: People Strategy and Development
experience.description: Overview: Delivered dynamic organizational structures for the Indian entity and set up the company's team structure for business expansion in Indonesia.Achievements:Social Media Reach: Increased social media reach by 27% to 43k and generated over 200 job referrals by pioneering the first referral-referee contest.Efficiency Gains: Produced a 20% efficiency gain in cross-functional collaboration by designing 40 team structures for over 900 employees using the Whimsical tool.Expansion Strategy: Strategized MPL Indonesia's first vertical-wise team structures to drive precision growth through over 30 CXO consultations.
experience.description_html: Overview: Delivered dynamic organizational structures for the Indian entity and set up the company's team structure for business expansion in Indonesia.Achievements:Social Media Reach: Increased social media reach by 27% to 43k and generated over 200 job referrals by pioneering the first referral-referee contest.Efficiency Gains: Produced a 20% efficiency gain in cross-functional collaboration by designing 40 team structures for over 900 employees using the Whimsical tool.Expansion Strategy: Strategized MPL Indonesia's first vertical-wise team structures to drive precision growth through over 30 CXO consultations.

experience.title: Strategic Foresight - Banking
experience.description: Overview: Conducted strategic foresight research in the banking sector, fintech, and social innovation.Achievements:Banking 4.0 Profiling: Profiled banking 4.0 and documented two detailed reports on strategic foresight in the banking sector, fintech, and social innovation.Survey Analysis: Surveyed over 200 banking professionals with a 22-question questionnaire to analyze the PESTEL effects on banking in Singapore.PESTEL Analysis: Conducted PESTEL analysis, contributed to the literature review, and generated uncertainty and scenario matrices for banking 4.0.
experience.description_html: Overview: Conducted strategic foresight research in the banking sector, fintech, and social innovation.Achievements:Banking 4.0 Profiling: Profiled banking 4.0 and documented two detailed reports on strategic foresight in the banking sector, fintech, and social innovation.Survey Analysis: Surveyed over 200 banking professionals with a 22-question questionnaire to analyze the PESTEL effects on banking in Singapore.PESTEL Analysis: Conducted PESTEL analysis, contributed to the literature review, and generated uncertainty and scenario matrices for banking 4.0.

experience.title: Research - MSMEs and Airlines
experience.description: Overview: Conducted in-depth research on skill gaps in the MSME sector in India and provided strategic insights into airline service quality and oil spill response strategies.Achievements:Skill Gap Analysis: Measured and compared skill gaps across various sectors of MSMEs in India, benchmarking against international industries.Technology Gaps Study: Investigated technological gaps in different MSME sectors in India.Airline Service Quality Report: Prepared a comprehensive report on the service quality of Indian airlines, presented to the CEO of SpiceJet.Comparative Analysis: Compared six Indian airlines considering all stakeholders, including airports, ground handling agencies, regulators, passengers, and industry associates, and provided suggestions to improve service quality.Oil Spill Impact Study: Analyzed the destructive impacts of oil spills on the marine environment and coastal economy, and reviewed existing oil spill response strategies.Improvement Proposals: Made proposals for improvements in current oil spill response strategies in India.Evidence Maintenance: Identified effective methods to maintain evidence for identifying polluters and taking appropriate administrative, civil, or criminal action against them.
experience.description_html: Overview: Conducted in-depth research on skill gaps in the MSME sector in India and provided strategic insights into airline service quality and oil spill response strategies.Achievements:Skill Gap Analysis: Measured and compared skill gaps across various sectors of MSMEs in India, benchmarking against international industries.Technology Gaps Study: Investigated technological gaps in different MSME sectors in India.Airline Service Quality Report: Prepared a comprehensive report on the service quality of Indian airlines, presented to the CEO of SpiceJet.Comparative Analysis: Compared six Indian airlines considering all stakeholders, including airports, ground handling agencies, regulators, passengers, and industry associates, and provided suggestions to improve service quality.Oil Spill Impact Study: Analyzed the destructive impacts of oil spills on the marine environment and coastal economy, and reviewed existing oil spill response strategies.Improvement Proposals: Made proposals for improvements in current oil spill response strategies in India.Evidence Maintenance: Identified effective methods to maintain evidence for identifying polluters and taking appropriate administrative, civil, or criminal action against them.
